claim: Lion is a film based on the non-fiction book A Long Way Home.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lion is a 2016 Australian biographical film directed by Garth Davis  (  in his feature debut  )  and written by Luke Davies , based on the non-fiction book A Long Way Home by Saroo Brierley with Larry Buttrose .
